fresh.body:
Hi Ben,

I hope you are well! {{goal}} Based on your experience, I thought you'd be a great person to reach out to.

We're looking to schedule a one-hour paid consulting call with our client. Regarding compensation, do you have experience working with expert networks or conducting similar calls? If so, weâ€™d be happy to match your standard hourly rate. Our typical market rate is $350-$450 USD for the hour. Would that be acceptable for you?

Do you have 5-10 minutes to discuss? Feel free to book a time on my calendar to go over the project details.

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

be_prior.body:
Hi Ben,

Thank you for being a part of the Tegus by AlphaSense expert network!

My name is Ben, {{goal}} To get started, I just need your answers to these research questions:

  • Are you a customer of Twilio?
  • When did you last evaluate competitor solutions?
  • What is your role in the decision making process?

I have you down for an hourly rate of $300 per hour. Does that rate still work for you?

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

be_no_prior.body:
Hi Ben,

Thank you for being a part of the Tegus by AlphaSense expert network!

My name is Ben, {{goal}}

I have you down for an hourly rate of $550 per hour. Does that work for you? If so, please book a time on my calendar to discuss the project details: https youcanbook.com/benscheidelman

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben
